thread.title: UNWTO Regional Commissions elect new chairs
thread.title_full: UNWTO Regional Commissions elect new chairs

author: eTN Editor
title: UNWTO Regional Commissions elect new chairs
text:
UNWTO Regional Commissions elect new chairs   
Sep 14, 2015 eTN   
UNWTO’s six Regional Commissions have elected new chairs and vice-chairs, as well as the host countries of their meetings in 2016. The decisions were made on the occasion of the ongoing 21st UNWTO General Assembly in Medellin, Colombia (September 12-13, 2015). 
Regional Commission for Africa (CAF) 
Chair: Zimbabwe Vice chairs: Cameroon, C0te d’Ivoire 
Host of the next CAF: C0te d’Ivoire 
Regional Commission for the Americas (CAM) 
Chair: Haiti 
Host of the next CAM: Cuba 
Regional Commission for East Asia and the Pacific (CAP) 
Chair: Philippines 
Host of the next CAP: Japan (Joint CAP/CSA meeting) 
Regional Commission for Europe (CEU) 
Chair: Switzerland 
Host of the next CEU: Lithuania 
Regional Commission for the Middle East (CME) 
Chair: Lebanon 
Host of the next CME: Lebanon 
Regional Commission for South Asia (CSA) 
Chair: India
